page.title: 17A PROBUS HOUSEWIFE'S DAY 2
page.content: {A Probus Housewife's Day (2). I am a housewife with 2 children.We moved to Probus nearly 4 years ago & live on a new estate.A typical day starts with the alarm at 7.29a.m.I call my children,make breakfast for them & after they have left for school I have braekfast with my husband.I wash tha dishes,take the laundry from the washing & hang it to dry in the garden.I dust & vacuum & then shop in the village.I prepare lunch for myself & my husband (who is decorating the outside of the house).In the afternoon I work in the garden & then collect a neighbour's young daughter from school.When my children arrive home I give them a snack & then prepare the evening meal.My day ends watching T.V. & knitting.
